channel.title: Help Getting Online
channel.description:
EDIT: well i decided to use my other source silabgarza and still wondering about drops. but why cant people connect to my server? ive got a di-524 router and i went into it and did virtual server then i put in port: 43594 and did tcp or both clicked save and still people cant connect, why? ive also got a no-ip thing only i can log on.
hello RaZoR36 here i need some help with drops i have a devolution v7 source which is dodian base and i dont no how to make monsters drop items.
all help will be appreciated
